name: Checkered Taxi
description:
Created for the LSDJAM2022

Play as the cabbie and travel to 3 worlds while you venture through the dreamscape. Each world contains wild environments such as a small neighbourhood with a colourful buffalo mechanic and a winter landscape with a stumbling bumbling salaryman late for work. Don't forget to chat with the rest of the citizens as you try to find your cab to get on with the day.

Content Warning
  • Nudity
  • Flashing Lights
  • Mentions of Violence
  • Swearing

###########

Controls:

(Tank-like controls)

[WASD] to Move

[Q] Turn Left

[E] Turn Right

[ESC] Pause

[SPACE] Dialog

###########

Credits:

A game developed by: JUGGY

Music created by: Fidel Delgado https://fideldelgado.itch.io/

Made in Godot 3.5

Cover created in Bryce 4

###########

Dev Notes

This is my submission for LSDJAM 2022. Took about a month to create(minus the procrastination). The game might not be fun for many, it most definitely won't make sense and there will be bugs. Optimization of code isn't here and to be honest that's part of the charm with this game. Much thanks for the people that played this. Much thanks to Figglewatts for hosting and much thanks to Osamu Sato(and Asmik Ace team) for making LSD: Dream Emulator for inspiration.
